price: 99. Bazali kolikya été bakobika na mwango ya Allah? Kasi mwango ya Allah likozuaka sé bazangi.
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُواْ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَلَا يَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū makra al-lahi falā yamanu makra al-lahi illā al-qawmu al-khāsirūna
